artist: Bill Jensen; Author: John Yau; Publisher: Universal Limited Art Editions (ULAE)
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
image_copyright:

medium: Artist's book: Mixed intaglio, woodcut, letterpress
text: Jensen's evocative abstract imagery and his penchant for intaglio printmaking are fully realized in this artist's book that celebrates the memory of the Austrian Expressionist poet and author Georg Trakl (1887-1914). In collaboration with American poet John Yau, Jensen invokes the spirit of Trakl's modernist vision with a series of atmospheric compositions that use landscape as a nominal point of departure.
title: Postcards from Trakl
